AppointmentScheduleAggr.name: AppointmentScheduleAggr
AppointmentScheduleAggr.description: Records the utilization of a service resource, by date, for the Load Balancing appointment assignment policy.

Name.description: The name or ID of the AppointmentScheduleAggr object.

ResourceUtilizationCount.description: The number of appointments scheduled for a service resource. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ServiceResourceId.description: The service resource associated with the appointment scheduling aggregate.

TotalResourceUtilization.description: The number of minutes for which the service resource has scheduled appointments.

UsageType.description: Specify the usage type of the AppointmentScheduleAggr object.
